page.title: 01Introduction.
page.content: This area contains part of the village of{Steeple Bumpstead,}the village of{ {Birdbrook,}the country estate and privately owned stately home of{Moyn's {Park}and part of the settlement of{ {Wixoe,}which is based on the{Water {Pumping Station. } The main street of Steeple Bumpstead to fall within this grid is{Chapel {Street.}Along this street are the{ {Congregational Chapel,}the{Village {Hall,}the village stores, the Police Station and the{Old Vicarage,}as well as some houses and cottages of architectural interest, a bread depot, and an Agricultural Machinery suppliers. {Birdbrook}is a pretty village lying on the Roman Military road from Colchester to Cambridge, also the route of the old Colne Valley Railway.
